title: Olly Murs to open Adobe Women FA Cup Final 2024 - 25
body_text:
Chart-topping singer and one of the UK’s most loved performers Olly Murs will get the party started at the 2025 Adobe Women’s FA Cup Final with a special guest performance at Wembley Stadium.
Currently in the midst of his nationwide arena tour 15 Years of Hits, Olly will perform at the national stadium before his show at the OVO Arena Wembley on the night of Sunday 18 May. The Troublemaker singer will play two of his iconic tracks to a packed-out Wembley crowd before Chelsea take on Manchester United in the Final.
“I’m absolutely buzzing to be performing at the home of English football and at the Adobe Women’s FA Cup Final," said Olly Murs.
"It’s amazing to see how much the women’s game has grown over the last few years and it’s a real honour to be part of one of the biggest days in the calendar.
"As a lifelong Manchester United fan I’ll be hoping the Reds lift the trophy at full-time, but Chelsea have had a great season and I’m sure it’ll be an incredible day whoever comes out on top.”
The 2025 Adobe Women’s FA Cup Final kicks off at 1.30pm on Sunday 18 May, with Olly Murs’ performance part of the build-up coverage on BBC One from 12.50pm.
Tickets for the match are still available to purchase here.
